address: Xã Pa Vệ Sử, Huyện Mường Tè, Tỉnh Lai Châu
thought:
**My Reasoning for Identifying the New Ward**

Okay, so I've been given an old address, "Xã Pa Vệ Sử, Huyện Mường Tè, Tỉnh Lai Châu," and I need to figure out its new administrative unit (ward).  My initial approach is to break it down. First, I identify the province, "Tỉnh Lai Châu," and the ward, "Xã Pa Vệ Sử."

Next, I look at the provided resolutions. I immediately check if "Tỉnh Lai Châu" is listed in the resolutions stating which provinces aren't merging any units. Thankfully, Lai Châu isn't on that list, which means I can start looking for ward-specific changes.

I systematically review each resolution for mentions of "Xã Pa Vệ Sử."  Resolution 1670/NQ-UBTVQH15 catches my attention. Line 30 explicitly states that "Xã Pa Vệ Sủ" (which I recognize as a variant of the input ward) and another are merging into the new ward, "Xã Bum Nưa."  The other lines in this resolution, and the other resolution provided, don't have any bearing on this particular ward.

Now, I cross-reference this finding with my list of new wards.  I search for "Xã Bum Nưa" specifically within "Tỉnh Lai Châu."  Bingo! There's a perfect match:  `{"ward_code":"03466","ward_name":"Xã Bum Nưa","province_name":"Tỉnh Lai Châu"}`.

I have a very high degree of confidence in this result. The resolution clearly states the merger, and the province names line up perfectly.  Therefore, I'll confidently construct my JSON output, citing resolution 1670/NQ-UBTVQH15, the relevant line, and a "high" confidence level, along with the details of the new ward: "Xã Bum Nưa" and its associated code. The province remains the same.

citation.header: 1670/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Lai Châu
citation.line: 30. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của xã Pa Vệ Sủ và xã Bum Nưathành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Bum Nưa.
